titles.title: Commemorating the 80th anniversary of the establishment of the Missisquoi National Wildlife Refuge.
Commemorating the 80th anniversary of the establishment of the Missisquoi National Wildlife Refuge.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This resolution commemorates the 80th anniversary of the establishment of the Missisquoi National Wildlife Refuge and recognizes the importance of this protected land to biodiversity and fragile ecosystems in Vermont and the world.
